participant_2.background:
I like fashion and want to become a fashion designer, but I can't tell my family because they are conservative.
I love to cook and try new recipes, but my favorite place to eat is at my family's house.
I'd like to be able to weld things.
i m a vegetarian.
i wish i could live in iceland.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a fashion designer, but I can't tell my family because they are conservative.
Oh wow, really? What's that like?
It's hard because I love fashion and I want to share it with them, but they just don't understand.
I can understand that. My family isn't always supportive of my hobbies either.
It's so frustrating! I just wish they would be more open minded.
Yeah, I know. But you know what? You don't need their approval to do what you love.
You're right. I'm going to keep doing what I love, no matter what they say.
That's the spirit! What's your favorite thing about fashion?
I love the creativity and the ability to express myself. I love being able to create something beautiful and unique.
That's awesome! I can see why you love it so much.
Thank you! What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom with five kids.
Oh wow! That must be a lot of work.
It is, but it's also really rewarding. I love spending time with my kids and watching them grow up.
That's great! I'm sure they're lucky to have you.
